channel.title: How to add (Player) has just logged in, to a 711 or 698 server?

item.title: How to add (Player) has just logged in, to a 711 or 698 server?
item.dc:creator: @Skill_3D Skill 3D
item.description:
@Skill_3D wrote:

Go into player.java and search for this:

Somewhere under that you should start seeing lines starting with:

Before the first one of the lines starting with that add this:

for (Player p : World.getPlayers()) { if (p == null) { continue; } p.sendMessage("<col=ffffff><shad=030303></col></shad> <col=ff0000>" + this.getDisplayName() + "</col><col=ffffff><shad=030303> Has Logged In!"); continue; }

Change it to whatever you would like the part where it sends the message is

p.sendMessage("<col=ffffff><shad=030303></col></shad> <col=ff0000>" + this.getDisplayName() + "</col><col=ffffff><shad=030303> Has Logged In!");

<col=######> and <shad=######> are different colors (look them up for new colors).

Read full topic
